events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position and the resume looks promising.
The candidate's application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as software engineer and developer.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate's application and coordinate further steps in the hiring process.
Completed the initial screening call and the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software development and problem-solving skills.
The candidate responded positively to the interview invitation and confirmed availability for technical interviews next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for April 18th and will focus on coding challenges and system design.
Candidate completed the technical interview successfully and showcased excellent coding skills and architectural understanding.
Scheduled the HR interview for April 22nd to discuss the candidateâ€™s cultural fit and salary expectations.
HR interview completed positively with good alignment on company values and mutual expectations.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate with competitive compensation and benefits package.
The candidate provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team.
Candidate officially accepted the offer and confirmed the start date in May.
The onboarding process has started smoothly with orientation and access to development environments provided.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with the candidate fully integrated into the engineering team.
